pinMenuMessageLabel.message: Bandika kiendelezi kutoka kwa menyu ya fumbo hapo juu.
pinMenuMessageLabel.description: Pin the extension from puzzle menu above.

mainWelcomeHeading.message: Dondoa maandishi kutoka kwa ukurasa wowote / pdf kwenye wavuti
mainWelcomeHeading.description: Extract text from any page/pdf on the internet

littleInfoLabel.message: Picha imechukuliwa kwa OCR (Utambuzi wa Tabia ya Macho).
littleInfoLabel.description: Image taken for OCR (Optical Character Recognition).

pdfDragInfoLabel.message: Buruta 'n' dondosha faili hapa, au bofya kuchagua faili.
pdfDragInfoLabel.description: Drag 'n' drop some files here, or click to select files.

littleInfoPdfLabel.message: Pdf imechukuliwa kwa OCR (Utambuzi wa Tabia ya Macho).
littleInfoPdfLabel.description: Pdf taken for OCR (Optical Character Recognition).

extractTextFromImageLabel.message: Toa Nakala kutoka kwa picha hii

uploadPdfLabel.message: pakia pdf ili kutoa maandishi kutoka
uploadPdfLabel.description: upload pdf to extract text from

appDescription.message: Programu ya skana ya haraka na rahisi na pato la maandishi ya hali ya juu.
appDescription.description: A Fast and simple document scanner app with high quality text output.

subHeadOne.message: Scan Picha kutoka folda yako au mtandao.
subHeadOne.description: Scan Image from your folder or Internet.

subHeadOneDesc.message: Fanya taswira ya picha kwenye ukurasa wowote wa wavuti [ukitumia kiendelezi cha kivinjari chako] kwenye mtandao au pakia picha yako kwenye wavuti yetu kupata maandishi kwa kutumia teknolojia yetu bora ya usahihi wa OCR.
subHeadOneDesc.description: Do Image scan on any webpage [using our browser extenion] on the internet or uplaod your image on our website to get text using our best accuracy OCR technology.

subHeadTwoDesc.message: Inasaidia lugha 100+ na anuwai zake. Changanua hati ya lugha yoyote na upate Nakala ukitumia programu yetu ya Picha kwa Maandishi (OCR).
subHeadTwoDesc.description: Supports 100+ language and its variants. Scan document of any language and get Text using our Image to Text (OCR) app.

headF1Desc.message: Bonyeza kwenye chaguo "pakia pdf kufanya OCR" kutoka kwa menyu ya muktadha ili kufanya Hati ya kukagua Pdf na upate Nakala.
headF1Desc.description: Click on the option "upload pdf to do OCR" from context menu to do Document scan on Pdfs and get Text.

headF2Desc.message: Bonyeza ikoni ya ugani kutoka kwa Screen cropper itaonekana. kisha Bonyeza kitufe cha + skrini iliyokatwa itachunguzwa na utapata Nakala.
headF2Desc.description: Click on the extension icon from Screen cropper will appear. then Click on the + button, cropped screen will be scanned and you will get the Text.

headF3Desc.message: Cheza Nakala ya OCR ukitumia Nakala yetu kwa Teknolojia ya Hotuba. Tafsiri Nakala ya OCR katika lugha yoyote unayotaka.
headF3Desc.description: Play the the OCR Text using our Text to Speech Technology. Translate OCR Text in any language you want.
